contents.title: What are modifiers?
contents.description: Modifiers are a key feature of Mods that allow you to easily modify and enhance your content. They are small pieces of code that can be applied to your JS to add functionality, validation or style.

children.value: Modifiers are a key feature of Mods that allow you to easily modify and enhance your content. They are small pieces of code that can be applied to your JS to add functionality, validation or style.

contents.title: Writing Pages
contents.description: Docus is made to let you write all your content in Markdown and Vue components with the MDC syntax.
